explains: adj. 结实的；率直的；粗鲁的

sentences.en: He was a big, burly man.
sentences.cn: 他是个高大魁梧的男人。

sentences.en: No one expects him to get involved in the hurly-burly of campaigning.
sentences.cn: 谁也没有料到他会身陷乱哄哄的竞选活动。

sentences.en: The article stated that Dolly was an amorous type and that she liked burly, blue-collar kinds of men.
sentences.cn: 那篇文章说多莉属于多情的类型，而且她喜欢像蓝领工人一样结实的男人。
